basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ [Imperva Cloud WAF](https://www.imperva.com/resources/resource-library/datasheets/imperva-cloud-waf/) offers the industry's leading web application security firewall, providing enterprise-class protection against the most sophisticated security threats. As a cloud-based WAF, it ensures that your website is always protected against any type of application layer hacking attempt. Imperva Cloud WAF is a key component of Imperva's market-leading, full stack application security solution which brings defence-in-depth to a new level. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Azure Monitor HTTP Data Collector API](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-collector-api) b. [Azure Functions](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/functions/#overview) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 10, **Hunting Queries:** 10 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This solution installs the data connector for ingesting Imperva WAF Cloud logs into Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
The solution installs a parser that transforms ingested data. The transformed logs can be accessed using the ImpervaWAFCloud Kusto Function alias.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
Sets the time name for analysis.
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
Detects abnormal protocol usage.

This solution installs the following hunting queries. After installing the solution, run these hunting queries to hunt for threats in Manage solution view.

elements.name: huntingquery1
elements.label: Imperva - Top destinations with blocked requests

options.text: Query searches destination IP addresses requests to which were blocked by the service. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery2
elements.label: Imperva - Applications with insecure web protocol version

options.text: Query searches for with insecure web protocol version. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)
Query searches for non HTTP/HTTPs applications. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)
Query searches for rare application protocols. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)
Query searches for rare client applications used. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)
Query searches for requests for rare destination ports. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)
Query searches for requests from known bots. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery8
elements.label: Imperva - Top sources with blocked requests

options.text: Query searches source IP addresses with blocked requests. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery9
elements.label: Imperva - Top applications with error requests

options.text: Query searches for top applications with protocol or network errors. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery10
elements.label: Imperva - Top sources with error requests

options.text: Query searches for top source IP addresses with protocol or network errors. This hunting query depends on ImpervaWAFCloudAPI data connector (ImpervaWAFCloud Parser or Table)
